mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT Z.ZZIMS,P.*, M.*,S.ST_NAME,A.PHO_RT, A.PHO_NUM,PT.UP_STA,PT.PORT_DATE FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,STUDIO S,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) Z, (SELECT PHO_RT, PHO_NUM, CTGR_NUM FROM PHOTO WHERE PHO_NUM IN (SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(PHO_NUM)) FROM PHOTO WHERE UPPER(CTGR) = 'P' GROUP BY CTGR_NUM) ORDER BY PHO_NUM) A, PORTFOLIO PT WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID AND A.CTGR_NUM = PT.PORT_NUM AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+) AND M.ID = S.ST_ID(+) AND P.PTG_ID = #{ptgId} AND UPPER(PT.UP_STA)='Y' ORDER BY PT.PORT_DATE DESC

SELECT NVL(Z.ZZIMS,0),P.*,M.* FROM PHOTOGRAPHER P, MEMBER M,(SELECT CTGR_NUM,COUNT(*) ZZIMS FROM ZZIM GROUP BY CTGR_NUM ORDER BY 2 DESC) Z WHERE P.PTG_ID = M.ID AND M.ID = Z.CTGR_NUM(+)
ORDER BY P.REGI_DATE DESC ORDER BY M.NAME
